backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing implemented features, involved files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing human‑written summaries for various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark CSS variables and global background/text behavior.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and script loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the TanStack Router setup and routes for the main app pages.
frontend/src/components.json: shadcn-ui config mapping component aliases and Tailwind settings.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with back navigation, theme toggle, app title, and saved-questions button.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Root layout applying theme initialization, header, routed content, footer, and toasts.
frontend/src/components/BookCard.tsx: Clickable book card component with icon, title, description, and metadata counts.
frontend/src/components/HintsPanel.tsx: Interactive hints panel allowing showing, hiding, or revealing hints progressively.
frontend/src/components/ProseContent.tsx: Renders HTML content with prose-styled typography and dark-mode support.
Buttons for marking questions complete or saving them, with tooltips and state hooks.
frontend/src/components/QuestionSections: Renders collapsible sections for a topic’s video, hints, and solution with UI controls and state toggles.
frontend/src/components/SavedQuestionRow: Displays a saved question row with metadata and actions to open or remove it.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button component that toggles between light and dark themes using useTheme.
frontend/src/components/TopicRow.tsx: Renders an interactive topic row showing completion state and clickability.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCompletedTopics.ts: Manages completed topic IDs in local storage with a toggle function and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating no backend queries exist.
frontend/src/hooks/useSavedQuestions.ts: Stores saved question IDs in local storage with functions to toggle or remove items and toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages theme state synced to local storage and applies light/dark mode classes.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and custom styles defining light/dark themes, typography, utilities, and scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/lib/data.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for books, sections, and topics, and provides the static content data used throughout the app.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root, sets up React Query and Internet Identity provider, and renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/BooksPage.tsx: Renders the book selection view, displaying available books as animated cards with navigation on click.
frontend/src/pages/QuestionDetailPage.ts: Displays an individual question with metadata, content, navigation between topics, and related actions.
frontend/src/pages/SavedQuestionsPage.ts: Shows the user's saved questions, resolving topic metadata and providing navigation to each question.
frontend/src/pages/TopicsPage.tsx: Lists all sections and topics for a book with progress tracking and navigation into individual question pages.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requirements, and known issues for the Swift Interview Prep app.
